alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Onslow County through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Verona to Swansboro. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New River Station, Camp Lejeune Center, Swansboro, Verona and Haws Run. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
